name: Croatian Hero 1991 Beta
description:
You are a Croatian hero and your goal is to collect as many coins as you can. You`re falling all the time with the parachute! If you get too close to bombs, the game is over. Other enemies takes away your coins. This is the beta version of the game! For moving your hero use your mobile sensor (rotate your mobile phone left and right).

<a href="https://croatian-hero-1991-b.flycricket.io/privacy.html">Licence >></a>
